summary: 2000 IMPALA LS HAD ALIGNMENT DONE @35,000 MILES.  NOTICED UNEVEN WEAR ON LEFT FRONT TIRE ~43,000 MILES.  TOOK BACK TO DEALER, THEY SAID TO REPLACE TIRES AND THEY WOULD REALIGN IT.  REPLACED TIRES ~ 47,000 MILES, TOOK BACK IN AND TURNED OUT THE LEFT FRONT TIE ROD WAS BAD THEY CAN'T ALIGN IT.  TIRES HAS ABOUT 1/2 OF PLAY IN IT, RECOMMENDED NOT TO BE DRIVEN UNTIL FIXED.*AK
